## ConstantVec2Node.getSerializationCls() method

Gets the serialization descriptor for this node type

**Signature:**

```typescript
static getSerializationCls(): SerializableClass;
```
**Returns:**

[SerializableClass](doc/markdown/./scene.serializableclass.md)

Serialization class descriptor with property definitions

## Remarks

Used by the serialization system to save/load node graphs.
